name: PICO ZERO
description:
Run, jump, and float through this 8-bit platforming adventure! Meet PICO, a blue rabbit trying to make his way to his girlfriend's house. Stomp enemies, collect coins, and explore the island before the sun goes down.

However, not is all as it seems in this world...

And you might be the only one who can stop it.

PICO ZERO is a psychological horror prototype made in a couple of weeks. If you would like to see the true PICO story and all of the dark secrets, consider leaving a good review, thanks!
